entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wynyard
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wynyard 3:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -20.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -25.3°C
Wind: SE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023
